Message:
Hello, Welcome to THE CAKES. We provide you beset customized 3D and 2D cakes at your door step. 

For what occasion you would like to buy the cake for?
That's great, How many people are you expecting?

What Type of Cake you would like to order 

1) 3D Cake P̶K̶R̶ ̶9̶0̶0̶  PKR 700 / lbs 

1) 2D Cream Cake P̶K̶R̶ ̶7̶0̶0̶  PKR 500 / lbs

How would you like to customize the cake?  

1) Provide Picture 

2) Select from Trending customizations.
Please reply with the picture for your customized cake.
**Minimum order size is 5 lbs that you can order. Our estimation for cake size is based on 6 People / 1 lbs.
What Date you'd like to get deliverd? e.g. Date Month Year , Date/Month/Year.
What Date you'd like to get deliverd? e.g. Hours:Minutes AM/PM  10:25 PM
Please enter your address where you'd like to get the cake delivered.
We'd like to informe you when your cake is at your doorstep. Please enter your contact numner you want us to connect with you. e.g. 033#-#######
Awesome! Expect an email shortly for our side that would include your order!
Please enter your email address where we'd sent you the order status & summary. e.g. abc@xyz.com
